name: Super GM-Type
description:
Super GM-Type

Sidescrolling "bullet hell" shooter

Warning:

For some reason, when I converted this to HTML5, the score now counts backwards, so there is no way to gain any extra lives... I could fix it, but this is just a demo and this game will not be released as an HTML5 web game anyways... It's going to be a desktop game, and maybe (if I get the money to buy the license) an Android/iOS game... Score works on the downloadable version just fine...

Controls:

WASD or Arrows to move

Hold space for normal fire rate

Tap space to fire as fast as u can hit the spacebar
